title: Notify.gov
description: Designed and developed the Notify.gov platform, a secure government messaging service. Led branding, front-end development, and accessibility improvements, ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.2 and the U.S. Web Design System (USWDS). Built data visualizations with D3.js to enhance insights.

title: US Web Design System - Inclusive Design Patterns
description: Worked as a front-end developer, UX designer, and researcher on inclusive, accessible design patterns for the USWDS. Integrated key considerations from user research and accessibility guidelines.

title: 10x.gsa.gov
description: Led dev and design of a reimagined 10x.gsa.gov, a platform for federal innovation funding. Improved usability, accessibility, and information flow while maintaining USWDS consistency.

title: Antidote Therapies
description: Parallax site for Antidote Functional Therapies.

title: Lara Bobel - Portfolio
description: Portfolio site for Lara Bobel. Written in AngularJS.
